title: Traptrix Atypus

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every chance to draw trap holes, you draw two instead of one.
- While this role is in game, all traptrix roles are treated as having powerful attack.
- You are unaffected by the first two "hostile" visits towards you.
- Hostile is defined as would have a negative impact on the game in a substantial way.
- If visits fail against you, the visitor is not informed
- You may play multiple trap holes in a singular night.

desc:
Post 3275
*Ill heal you if you come just a little bit closer*
